rituals.title: Harden the orbit flight recorder
rituals.description: Dedicate a deep session to tighten runner telemetry so Echo can prove performance before each upgrade.
steps: Trace three full executions (Python, Node, chained) and log queue/start/teardown timings.
Expose structured events on the WebSocket stream with per-phase latency + resource hints.
Export the latest capture to `workspaces/demo/logs/orbit-flight-recorder.json` for the changelog.

rituals.title: Evolve the luminary beacon grid
rituals.description: Iterate on the overlay system that keeps palette, soundtrack, and intent visible in the editor.
steps: Storyboard at least two overlay states (calm + launch) with typography, gradients, and motion.
Prototype transitions with CSS variables or shader-like pseudo code inside the workspace.
Publish a GIF/screenshot or markdown walkthrough linked from the ritual log.

rituals.title: Activate the reviewer radar
rituals.description: Pair with another operator to stress-test reviewer discovery and leave a ready-to-run handoff kit.
steps: Enumerate the last five commits for the feature files and label likely reviewers.
Bundle run instructions, telemetry screenshots, and TODO prompts into a single console note.
Schedule an async check-in and capture any new questions or blockers in the ritual archive.

rituals.title: Rehearse the skyway upgrade lane
rituals.description: Dry-run the blue/green rollout for Echo Computer cloud services with telemetry stitched into the ritual log.
steps: Spin up the canary environment and smoke-test public endpoints with synthetic workload traces.
Shift 10â€“20% traffic through the canary using weighted routing or feature flags while watching error budgets.
Record rollback-ready commands plus metrics snapshots into the ritual journal for reuse.

rituals.title: Stabilise the cache corridor
rituals.description: Validate cache hit rates across three workspaces and decide which keys should be pinned or rotated.
steps: Run a triad of workloads (Node, Python, mixed) and capture cache metrics for each.
Simulate a cache bust by changing dependencies, then measure recovery and rebuild times.
Publish guidance on default TTLs and manual overrides to the ritual archive.

rituals.title: Refresh the upgrade & patch cadence
rituals.description: Review cloud dependencies and document the next patch window for Echo Computer.
steps: Audit the deployed services and note any pending security or runtime updates.
Schedule a patch window with a rollback plan and add it to the ops calendar.
Publish the upgrade notes and checkpoints to the ritual archive.

rituals.title: Publish the ops journal bundle
rituals.description: Ship a polished weekly ops journal that stitches together telemetry, reviewer notes, and next steps.
steps: Aggregate the week's telemetry snippets and tag each with affected services.
Invite a reviewer to co-author the risk/decision log and capture their responses inline.
Export the bundle to `/handoff/journal` with hashes so downstream consumers can verify integrity.
